room_title: Escape room "Voodoo" by Timed Out in Charlotte
room_address: 12239 N Community House Rd Charlotte, NC 28277
room_description: It was supposed to be a fun night on Bourbon Street. The drinks were popping, the parties were raging and the streets were crowded in celebration of Mardi Gras. Unbeknownst to you a mysterious figure has tripped you and your friends into Madame Laveauâ€™s House of Voodoo. Angered for entering her private sanctum uninvited the High Priestess placed a dreaded hex on you and your companions. All is not lost for she has given you one chance to remove the hex using the items found in her shop. Can you and your team win over the High Priestess to prove that you honor Voodoo magic before time runs out?
